key.name: admin_help_brief
key.value: This plugin adds a widget named "Profile Snippets" to User Profile.

key.name: config_step1
key.value: Follow to User Profile settings page

key.name: config_step2
key.value: Click the edit widget button ( highlighted on the image below ) on the "Profile Snippets" widget

key.name: config_step3
key.value: You will see the widget settings popup.

key.name: config_steps_end
key.value:
That is all! You can change default settings of the widget in this popup.
You can rearrange the snippets list, hide some of them, etc...

But do not forget that users are able to overwrite this settings. To disallow them doing it you can check the "Freeze" option of the settings.

key.name: config_steps_label
key.value: If you do not know how to configure widgets or couldn't find the widget settings - click here to read a brief instruction.

key.name: empty_active_section
key.value: Drag snippets here to make them visible

key.name: empty_hidden_section
key.value: Drag snippets here to hide them

key.name: leave_review_suggest
key.value: Please, leave a review if you liked the plugin.
